thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 2 of 721
thread.title: Mrs Erin Tobin
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Mrs Erin Tobin

author: Mrs Erin Tobin
title: Mrs Erin Tobin
text:
Decided on using Redspot car rentals after our current reservation with another company had been cancelled with no explanation and with no help in order to resolve the issue- other then charging us double to rent another car!
Went across to Redspot at Sydney Airport and spoke with a Matt who was absolutely unreal! As it was late at night and we had our two year old in tow, Matt ensured the process went smoothly and efficiently whilst also locating a car seat for us. Cannot thank him enough for helping us out of this situation in a time we needed it the most! If you're reading this Matt- THANKS AGAIN SO MUCH!
